column4: Anyone can guide me? im already here at LiveCD but i cant seem to get any Upgrade?
Bluel: like i need to download it?
Click the install icon on the desktop to install Ubuntu to your hard drive.
What version of Ubuntu are you using?
5.04 and 5.10 are both *very* old releases, and have not been supported for some time. Please download or order a recent version of Ubuntu.
Do you know how to burn an iso file to a CD?
im planning to boot it in USB
What OS will you be setting up the USB in ?
It's going to be difficult to create a bootable USB from within the ancient LiveCD you have.
No im DL version 10 right now Jordan_u
What OS are you downloading it with?
i have no other os.. just ubuntu
Then it's going to be difficult to make a Bootable USB drive from the iso you're downloading.
